title: Iconic Ramada Resort Stay on Phillip Island
description: Explore the natural beauty of Phillip Island with a family-friendly stay at the iconic Ramada Resort by Wyndham Phillip Island. Set across 65 acres of serene countryside and natural bushland, you can expect beautiful gardens and plenty of opportunities for spotting local wildlife. There’s ample opportunity to get active at the resort, with two outdoor swimming pools, a children’s pool, two health centre’s, spa & sauna and tennis courts. Experience local cuisine in the onsite licensed café or settle for a dinner in your cozy self-contained cottage. Popular attractions such as the chocolate factory, vineyard and Penguin Parade are just minutes from the resort.
location_description: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Phillip Island - OLD

title: Stylish Apartment Stay on Phillip Island
description: Explore the natural beauty of Phillip Island with a chic apartment stay at The Waves, located on the vibrant Cowes’ Esplanade. Soak up the natural beauty of this popular destination as you enjoy all the facilities of a modern, self-contained apartment, together with a late 11am check-out and complimentary Wi-Fi for up to two devices.

title: Waterfront Phillip Island Getaway, Just a 1.5-Hour Drive from Melbourne
description: Enjoy the natural beauty of Phillip Island - just a 1.5-hour drive from Melbourne - at the North Pier Hotel. A stone’s throw from Cowes Beach, the hotel is just a short stroll from local cafés, restaurants and shops. With a location directly on the pier of one of Victoria's only North-facing coastlines, you can expect some of the best ocean views in the whole state. Includes daily housekeeping and a late 12 noon checkout.

title: Beach House Luxury for Couples, Families or Groups of Friends
description: Explore the natural beauty of Phillip Island with a couples, family and pet-friendly stay at the beach-chic Verandah Retreat Phillip Island: a five-star home adorned with island-chic décor and fit with all the amenities you’d need to enjoy a coastal escape in Cowes, Phillip Island. Indulge in the ultimate chilled-out getaway with a two, three or five-night stay in a huge 260sqm home with four spacious bedrooms, an outdoor gas BBQ, outdoor furnished deck, welcome bottle of wine, guaranteed late checkout and savings on the very best local experiences.

title: Phillip Island Ramada Two- & Three-Bedroom Villa Retreat with Two Pools & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Explore the natural beauty of Phillip Island with a family-friendly stay at this cosy haven, set across 65 acres of serene countryside, natural bushland and beautiful gardens with an abundance of local wildlife. There’s ample opportunity to be active at the resort, with two outdoor swimming pools, a children’s pool, plenty of biking and walking tracks, a health and fitness centre and tennis courts. Experience local cuisine at onsite Flametrees Restaurant, Cafe and Bar or enjoy a dinner in your cosy self-contained villa.

Play in the sand while spotting fur seals splashing in the water at one of the island's incredible beaches and hang around until evening time to see the famous Phillip Island Penguin Parade. Popular attractions such as the chocolate factory, wineries and Penguin Parade are just minutes from the resort.
location_description: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Phillip Island
offer_address: 2128 Phillip Island Road, Cowes, Victoria 3922, Australia

title: Iconic Ramada Resort Stay on Phillip Island

Set across 65 acres of serene countryside and natural bushland, you can expect beautiful gardens and plenty of opportunities for spotting local wildlife. title: Tranquil Group Villa Escape near Phillip Island Wildlife Park & Iconic Penguin Parade
description:
Bask in the natural beauty of the charming Ramada Resort by Wyndham Phillip Island, surrounded by native gardens and an abundance of wildlife and featuring spacious two- and three-bedroom villas perfect for families or groups travelling together. Steps from Phillip Island Wildlife Park, you’ll find yourself immersed in unique wildlife experiences, such as spotting sleepy koalas napping in the eucalyptus trees or handfeeding native kangaroos and wallabies. As evening falls, take a short drive to the famous Penguin Parade, where you can witness hundreds of penguins making their way ashore. There’s no shortage of aquatic activities to partake in, with plenty of beaches nearby, or simply stroll down to nearby Cowes for some exquisite local seafood at one of the many mouthwatering restaurants by the shore.

If you feel like staying put, the resort has a number of exceptional facilities suitable for the whole family. Let the kids run wild in the games room or tumble around on the playground as you unwind in one of the two outdoor pools or the heated indoor lap pool. Treat yourself at the Flametrees Bar and Restaurant, serving indulgent fare such as Moroccan rack of lamb, barramundi red curry in coconut cream and fresh seafood share platters. With a range of roomy villas decked out in classic comfort, it’s no wonder the rustic charm of the resort and myriad of nature activities on offer have created the perfect atmosphere for some family-friendly fun.
location_description: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Phillip Island

title: Phillip Island Family-Friendly Two- & Three-Bedroom Villas with Heated Indoor Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Explore the natural beauty of Phillip Island with a family-friendly stay at this cosy haven, set across 65 acres of serene countryside, natural bushland and beautiful gardens with an abundance of local wildlife.

There’s ample opportunity to be active at the resort, with two outdoor swimming pools, a children’s pool, plenty of biking and walking tracks, a health and fitness centre and tennis courts. Experience local cuisine at onsite Flametrees Restaurant and Bar or enjoy a dinner in your cosy self-contained villa. Take a moment for yourself and sink into the heated pool, spa or sauna - the ultimate way to unwind.

Play in the sand while spotting fur seals splashing in the water at one of the island's incredible beaches and hang around until evening time to see the famous Phillip Island Penguin Parade. Popular attractions such as the chocolate factory, wineries and Penguin Parade are just minutes from the resort.
location_description: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Phillip Island
offer_address: 2128 Phillip Island Road, Cowes, Victoria 3922, Australia

title: Family-Friendly Phillip Island Esplanade Stay with A$25 Daily Dining Credit
description:
Explore the natural beauty of Phillip Island with a family-friendly stay at this cosy retreat, set overlooking the panoramic Bass Strait. Staying active is easy at this laidback island escape, where you’ll find an outdoor pool, a fun inflatable zone for kids and scenic trails ideal for cycling or strolls. When hunger strikes, head to the onsite Bar Bistro for hearty crowd-pleasers and local flavours.

Spend the day beachside building sandcastles and watching playful fur seals bobbing offshore, then stick around as the sun sets to witness the world-famous Penguin Parade. Other local highlights - from the chocolate factory and charming wineries to the Maru Koala Animal Park - are all just a short drive away.
